column3: Vendors can onboard themselves in the Rahat ecosystem through Vendor app Registration.
column5: Vendors should be able to register themseles using Vendor app
column7: Sucessful registration. But takes 2-3 minutes to register

column3: Vendors needs to input their basic details during registration

Name 
Phone number
Adress:
Email address:

address

column3: Each vendor needs to have a unique phone number.
column4: phone number already exits aalready registered phone number
column5: The system should be able to check whether or not the phone number is unique. Incase of duplication, error messeage should be sent
column7: takes in already existed phone number as well

column3: Each vendor needs to have a unique email address.
column5: The system should be able to check whether or not the email address is unique. Incase of duplication, error messeage should be sent
column7: takes in already existed email address as well

column3: They also need to upload their profile photo

column7: Available

column3: after registartion, wallet will be created
column5: Vendors wallet account should be created after registration
column7: Wallet is created after registration, But it takes 2-3 minutes sometimes.

column3: Each vendor account will have a unique wallet address
column5: Each vendor wallet account should have a unique wallet address
column7: Unique address is created for each wallet

column3: if vendors want to open their vendor account in some other phone or wants to relogin to the account, they can restore the account
column5: Vendors should be able to restore their wallet.
column7: vendors can restore account

column3: They can restore the wallet using mnemonic
column5: Vendor should be able to restore wallet using mnemonic.
column7: 12 word mnemonics created after every wallet creation

column2: Verify Restore fail if incorrect mnemonic
column3: Vendors cannot restore wallet, if mnemonics is typed wrong
column5: Error message should be shown if incorrect mnemonics typed
column7: error message is displayed if typed wrong mnemonics

column3: After successful registration and creation of wallet, a 12 word mnemonic will be created for one vendor account. this will be unique as well
column5: After completion of registration, 12 word mnemonics should be created
column7: 12 word mnemonics created after every wallet creation

column3: The mnemonic should be kept safely. But if required vendors can view the mnemonic whenever required( Untill they are logged in to their account)
column5: Vendors should be able to view the 12 word mnemonic when they are logged in to the account
column7: mnemonics can be viewed if Settings>Backup>Restore using seedphrase

column2: Verify Backup Wallet in Google Drive
column3: Vendors can backup their wallet in google drive as well.
column5: Vendors should be able to back up the wallet in google drive.
column7: functionality not working

column3: Vendors should be able to restore the wallet using the google drive ( if vendor has backed up their accountin drive )
column5: Vendors should be able to restore the backed up wallet using google drive
column7: not working

column3: Until and unless the vendor, cleans the app data, the vendor account should be loged in to the device
column5: Vendors should be logged in to their account unless they clean app data.
column7: stays logged in
